author: ericcano
body: The currently active version of Eigen (branch `cms-externals/cms/master/f612df273689a19d25b45ca4f8269463207c4fee`, used in `CMSSW_12_1_0_pre1` misses one commit from #4 (the other ones have been cherry picked). This PR re-imports this commit and solves the issue raised in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33797 (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/33797#issuecomment-890312996).
title: Re-adding last commit of "Re-import and update of Eigen patches for CUDA" #4
